85051.「ディエゴ……。\n 今の話 ちゃんと聞いていましたか？\n さあ こちらの方に:
Diego... did you hear what I just said? Come
on, say hello to this gentleman.

85052.「おっ……俺かよ！！\n そんな かったるいこと\n タッツィにでも やらせれば:
Oh... me! Why don't you just let Tazzi do the
heavy lifting?

85053.「これは すでに タッツィもこなしていること。\n 先輩なら 後輩に手本を示すく:
This is something Tazzi has already done. If
you are a senior, go out there and set an
example for your juniors.

85054.「……あ～ はじめまして。 \n 俺は ディエゴ。趣味は 二度寝と昼寝。\n い:
...Ah~ Nice to meet you. I'm Diego. I like to
doze off and take naps. I'm the master's
apprentice.

85055.「……しつけが行き届いておらず すみませんが\n 今から このディエゴに あなた:
...I apologize for my lack of discipline, but
I'm going to let this Diego guide you through
the trial that I am about to put you through.

85056.「……えぇと <pc>さんだっけ？\n まあ 俺の案内なら 何も問題ないさ。\n:
...uh, <pc>, right? Well, with my
guidance, you won't have any problems. Just
make sure you're on the big boat.

85057.「試練は 特別な場所に移動しなきゃならないから\n その気になったら 俺に話しか:
The trials have to be moved to a special
place, so talk to me when you're ready.

85058.「……あれ？ なんだか\n シュミの悪い部屋に 来ちまったぞ。:
What's going on? I've come to a room that
doesn't look very nice.

85060.「この 怪獣プスゴンさまの\n スウィートホームに\n 土足で あがりこみやがっ:
You dare to stand on the sweet home of Monster
Pusgon!

85061.「あちゃ～……よりによって\n バケモンの棲みかに 誤爆しちまったか……。:
Oh no... of all places, I must've misdirected
it to the home of the Bakemon...

85062.「……まぁ 来ちまったもんは しょうがねえ。\n ここで 試練をさせてもらうぜ。:
...Well, now that I'm here, I've got no
choice. I'm going to do a test here.

85063.「何を ゴチャゴチャと……！\n シュミが悪いとか 好き放題 言いやがって！\n:
What a mess...! You talk about bad shmutz all
you want! I'm going to beat you so bad, you
better brace yourself!

85064.「……あのさ アンタには悪いけど 今から\n すげえ強い魔物を 呼ばなきゃいけな:
Sorry, but I'll have to call in some very
powerful monsters right now. I'm not saying
it's a bad idea, but you better leave.

85065.「なっ……！ そ そんなデタラメ\n オレは まどわされないぜ……。: No...! I won't be fooled by that bullshit...

85066.「深淵に潜みし 異界の魔獣よ……: Otherworldly monsters, lurking in the abyss...

85067.「おいっ なに唱えてやがる！\n やめてくれっ！:
What the hell are you chanting at me for? Stop
it!

85069.「やめろオォォォーーッ！！\n オレの ウルトラハイセンスな\n インテリアがぁ:
Stop it!! My ultra sophisticated interior
design!!

85072.「シメるのは その後にしておいてやる！\n オマエ！ 覚えてろよっ！:
We'll finish you off afterwards! You! Remember
me!

85073.「待たせたな <cs_pchero>！\n さあ 遠慮はいらないぜ。\n 思う存:
Sorry to keep you waiting <cs_pchero>! Come
on, don't hold back. Go ahead and do what you
do best!

85074.「よし <cs_pchero>！\n あのバケモンも 出てったままみたいだし\n:
All right, <cs_pchero>! Looks like that
monster is still out there, so let's get this
over with!

85075.「くそっ あの野郎……。\n オレさまの家具に キズひとつでも付けてみろ。\n:
Damn that son of a bitch... Try to put even a
scratch on my furniture. Metta metta gitta
gitta gitta...

85077.「……元通り キレイにしておいたぜ。\n こっちの都合で 部屋を荒らしておいて\:
I cleaned up the room as it was before. I
can't just leave the room as it is after
having wrecked it for my own reasons.

85078.「お オマエ……。\n 最初は イケ好かねえチンピラだと思ったけど\n 案外 い:
You... at first I thought you were just a
punk, but you turned out to be a good guy...

85079.「おいおい やめろよ。\n ケツが かゆくなってくるぜ。:
Hey, hey, stop it. It's starting to itch my
ass.

85080.「よくやりました ディエゴ。\n 行き先を間違えた時は どうなることかと\n 思:
Well done, Diego. I was afraid of what would
happen when you went to the wrong place, but
it looks like you made it.

85082.「……ずっと ダーマ神殿から\n あなたの動向を 見守っていましたよ。:
I have been watching your every move from
Alltrades Abbey.

85083.「あなたが思っている以上に 私は あなたの\n 良い所も 悪い所も よく見ている:
I see more of the good and the bad in you than
you know. Please do not forget that...

85085.「そして お見事でした <cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたなら この試練を:
And well done <cs_pchero>. I had no doubt
you would make it through this trial.

85086.「このたびは 私の 不出来な教え子の修練に\n 付き合わせてしまいましたが\n:
I am sorry that I had to put Diego through the
training of my inadequate student, but I am
sure he learned a lot from it.

85087.「……そちらの方も ご迷惑をおかけしました。\n どうか 師である私の顔に免じて:
I apologize for the inconvenience to you as
well. Please forgive me for my face, my
teacher.

85088.「いっ……いやいや そんな！\n インテリアも 無事だったことだし\n そんな:
No, no, no, no, no, no! The interior is
safe, so don't bow down to me like that...

85089.「……さて。お約束した通り 試練に打ち勝った\n あなたの スキルポイントの割り:
...Well. As promised, I'm going to release
your skill point allotment limit to 130 for
overcoming the trial.

85090.「上限の解放は ダーマ神殿で おこないます。\n 私は ひとまず先に 失礼いたし:
The release of the upper limit can be done at
Alltrades Abbey. I'll leave you to it.

85091.「へへっ なんだ オマエ。\n マスターが相手だと おとなしいんだな？:
Heh heh, what's with you, boy? You're so
docile with the master, aren't you?

85092.「うっ……うるせー！\n オマエだって あの人には\n 頭が あがらないみたいじ:
Shut up! You're not even mad at that person,
are you? !

85093.「……へっ。言ってやがれ！\n 迷惑かけちまったのは 事実だし 今日のとこは\n:
...Heh. Go ahead and say it! It's true I've
caused you some trouble, and I'll let that
little whine slide for now.

85094.「さて <cs_pchero>。\n そろそろ ダーマ神殿に戻るとするか！:
Well <cs_pchero>. It's time to get back to
Alltrades Abbey!

85095.「……おい。これだけは言っとくけどな。\n 次からは ちゃんと 玄関から入ってこ:
...Hey. I'll tell you this much. Next time,
make sure you come in through the foyer!
That's the polite thing to do.

87312.「……ちっ わかったよ。 \n やりゃいいんだろ。やりゃあ……。: I get it. You can do it. So do it...
